project.description: Build the Kubernetes hyperkube docker image in Jenkins.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version of Kubernetes to pull and build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ARCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The architecture to build the hyperkube image.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo Building the hyperkube binary `date`
build/run.sh make all \ WHAT='cmd/hyperkube\ cmd/kubectl'
echo The hyperkube build completed `date`

echo Building the hyperkube docker container.
REGISTRY="jujusolutions" VERSION="${VERSION}" ARCH="${ARCH}" make -C cluster/images/hyperkube/ build
echo The hyperkube docker container finished building `date`

echo Saving the hyperkube docker container to a file.
DOCKER_BINARY=$WORKSPACE/kubernetes-hyperkube-$ARCH-$VERSION.tar docker save --output="${DOCKER_BINARY}" jujusolutions/hyperkube-$ARCH echo "The Docker binary is available at ${DOCKER_BINARY}"
